Example Documentation

Welcome to the Example Documentation. This is a sample site for testing the docs-llm-scraper tool.

Introduction

This documentation provides comprehensive information about our product and its features. Use the navigation menu to explore different sections.

Getting Started

To get started with our product, visit the Getting Started guide.

Installation

You can install our product using the following command:

npm install example-product

Basic Usage

Here's a basic example of how to use our product:


import { Example } from 'example-product';

const example = new Example();
example.start();
